name: Brothers in Arms: Double Time
summary:
The title is a compilation of the first two Brothers in Arms games, Brothers in Arms: Road to Hill 30 and Brothers in Arms: Earned in Blood and was developed by Gearbox Software and published by Ubisoft. It features 31 levels set during the Battle of Normandy.

The Wii version of the game uses the motion sensing abilities of the Wii Remote and the Nunchuk attachment for issuing battle gestures and squad commands during gameplay. It lacks any multiplayer features.
